summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 46th Avenue South, from Genesee Street to Ferdinand Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the construction of concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8837 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
